name: Feed (HSMIC)
description:
Political polarization is a major problem in today’s America, as we’ve seen with the rise of misinformation and the divide within Congress along party lines. Social media, with its ‘echo chamber’ effect, is exacerbating this issue. This game serves as a short, informative simulation of how social media processes your data.

Use the arrow keys to move the cursor, and follow the on-screen instructions!
